IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PHILLIPS PROGRAMS IS A PRIVATE, NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION SERVING OVER 500 CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES ANNUALLY IN THE WASHINGTON METROPOLITAN AREA. FOR MORE THAN 50 YEARS, WE HAVE HELPED CHILDREN WHERE OTHERS COULD NOT - TO PREPARE THEM TO BECOME SUCCESSFUL AND RESPONSIBLE. PHILLIPS PROGRAMS SERVES THE NEEDS OF INDIVIDUALS WITH BEHAVIORAL HEALTH NEEDS AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES AND THEIR FAMILIES THROUGH EDUCATION, FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES, COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FOR OVER FIFTY YEARS, PHILLIPS PROGRAMS' SPECIAL EDUCATION DAY SCHOOLS HAVE SERVED STUDENTS FROM ELEMENTARY GRADES THROUGH HIGH SCHOOL IN NATIONALLY ACCLAIMED FACILITIES IN ANNANDALE AND FAIRFAX, VA, AND LAUREL, MD. PHILLIPS CAREER PARTNERS PROVIDES INTENSIVE CAREER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION (CTE) IN A VARIETY OF CAREER PATHWAYS: BUILDING TRADES IN FAIRFAX AND LOUDOUN COUNTY, 3D DESIGN AND PRINT AT OUR VIRGINIA CAMPUSES AND CULINARY ARTS AND VERTICAL FARMING AT OUR MARYLAND CAMPUS. PHILLIPS FAMILY PARTNERS, A NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED PROGRAM, SERVES FAMILIES AND CHILDREN WITH DEVELOPMENTAL, EMOTIONAL AND BEHAVIORAL HEALTH NEEDS THROUGH HOME AND COMMUNITY-BASED COUNSELING, EDUCATION, FAMILY SUPPORT, ADVOCACY AND ABA SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: PHILLIPS SCHOOLS, ANNANDALE, LAUREL AND FAIRFAX, ARE DAY SCHOOLS THAT OFFER HIGHLY INDIVIDUALIZED LEARNING ENVIRONMENTS, SOCIAL SKILLS TRAINING AND PRACTICE, INDIVIDUALIZED AND INTEGRATED RELATED SERVICES INCLUDING COUNSELING, SPEECH AND LANGUAGE THERAPY, OCCUPATIONAL AND PHYSICAL THERAPY, CAREER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION CURRICULA, AND AUTHENTIC JOB OPPORTUNITIES IN THE COMMUNITY ALONG WITH CRISIS PREVENTION THROUGH A STRENGTH-BASED APPROACH.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PHILLIPS BUILDING FUTURES PROVIDES STUDENTS INTENSIVE HANDS-ON CAREER TRAINING FOR YOUTH. THE PROGRAM PROVIDES YOUTH WITH ACADEMIC PROGRAMMING, POSITIVE BEHAVIORAL SUPPORTS, INDUSTRY CERTIFICATION AND RELATED SERVICES WHILE THEY LEARN THE BUILDING TRADES AS PART OF THEIR SCHOOL DAY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PHILLIPS FAMILY PARTNERS HELPS FAMILIES GROW TOGETHER BY OFFERING HOME AND COMMUNITY-BASED COUNSELING AND BEHAVIOR THERAPY, AS WELL AS FAMILY EDUCATION AND ADVOCACY SERVICES. THE CLINICAL STAFF IS COMPRISED OF A TEAM OF LICENSED MENTAL HEALTH PROFESSIONALS, BOARD CERTIFIED BEHAVIOR ANALYSTS AND SOCIAL WORKERS, AND COUNSELORS THAT PROVIDE COMPREHENSIVE, EVIDENCE-BASED TREATMENT PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS A FAMILY'S INDIVIDUALIZED NEEDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD HAS FORMED A BOARD-DESIGNATED QUASI-ENDOWMENT FUND. AS REQUIRED BY GAAP, NET ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH ENDOWMENT FUNDS, INCLUDING FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD TO FUNCTION AS QUASI-ENDOWMENTS, ARE CLASSIFIED AND REPORTED BASED ON THE EXISTENCE OR ABSENCE OF DONOR-IMPOSED RESTRICTIONS. AS A RESULT, PHILLIPS' ENDOWMENT FUND IS INCLUDED IN UNRESTRICTED NET ASSETS, AS THE RESTRICTIONS WERE IMPOSED BY THE BOARD AND NOT AN OUTSIDE DONOR. THE BALANCE OF BOARD-DESIGNATED QUASI-ENDOWMENT FUND WAS $233,674 AS OF AUGUST 31, 2023.

FOR THE YEAR ENDED AUGUST 31, 2023, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES WAS MADE, AS PHILLIPS HAD NO NET UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME AND DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES REQUIRING RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THESE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

PHILLIPS PROGRAMS PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES TO A UNIQUE GROUP OF STUDENTS HAVING SPECIFIC EMOTIONAL AND SOCIAL NEEDS BASED ON PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL DISABILITIES, AND DRAWS ITS STUDENT BODY FROM THE ENTIRE WASHINGTON, DC METROPOLITAN AREA. STUDENTS ARE SELECTED BASED UPON THEIR SPECIFIC NEEDS AS RECOMMENDED BY THE LOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICTS WITH NO REGARD TO RACE, COLOR, SEX, NATIONAL OR ETHNIC ORIGIN.

THE NATIONAL SCHOOL LUNCH PROGRAM IS A FEDERALLY ASSISTED MEAL PROGRAM FOR PUBLIC AND NON-PROFIT PRIVATE SCHOOLS AND RESIDENTIAL CHILD CARE INSTITUTIONS IT REGULATES MEALS AND SNACKS TO BE NUTRITIOUS AND WELL BALANCED SCHOOLS RECEIVE SUBSIDIES FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (USDA) FOR EACH MEAL THEY SERVE THE MEALS THAT ARE SERVED MUST MEET FEDERAL REQUIREMENTS, AND THEY MUST OFFER FREE OR REDUCED PRICES TO FAMILIES THAT ARE ELIGIBLE.

IN THE PAST, THE BOARD HIRED A COMPENSATION SPECIALIST TO STUDY THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT OF PHILLIPS. AS PART OF THAT STUDY, THE SPECIALIST RECOMMENDED INCREASED WAGES FOR THE EXECUTIVES BASED ON DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES AND MARKET COMPARISONS. THE RECOMMENDATIONS WERE ACCEPTED AND ACTED UPON FROM THEN ON. THE SALARY PROGRAM MAKES THE CALCULATION BASED ON COL AND PROVIDES THE SALARY OF EACH EMPLOYEE, INCLUDING KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FEDERAL FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY THE PHILLIPS PROGRAM'S OUTSIDE ACCOUNTING FIRM. PHILLIPS PROGRAMS BOARD OF TRUSTEES FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE DRAFT FEDERAL FORM 990 AND PRESENTS IT TO THE FULL BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR FINAL APPROVAL PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS ACTIVELY ENFORCED BY HAVING BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEW AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY. THE POLICY IS ACTIVELY MONITORED BY KEY EMPLOYEES TO ENSURE THAT TRANSACTIONS ARE TRANSPARENT AND ARE NOT A SOURCE OF CONFLICT OF INTEREST..

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DURING 2018, A COMPENSATION STUDY WAS CONDUCTED TO REVIEW THE SALARY OF THE PRESIDENT & CEO. SINCE THEN, COST OF LIVING INCREASES HAVE BEEN PROVIDED SIMILAR TO THOSE PROVIDED TO ALL STAFF. THE CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER OF THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS ALL THE SALARIES AND PREPARES THE ANNUAL BUDGET. ANNUAL BUDGETS ARE THEN PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FINANCE COMMITTEE AS WELL AS TO STATE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES FOR APPROVAL. DELIBERATION AND APPROVAL OF THE SALARY INCREASES WITHIN THE ANNUAL BUDGET IS DOCUMENTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: ASSISTING INDIVIDUALS WITH BEHAVIORAL NEEDS AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
